section.docs:
Users are at Radium's core. They are related to all resources and do most of the actions in the system. Users are organized into teams. Teams have a leader. User's can also follow other teams or users to add their activities into their feed.
### Deleting Users
This request may take a while to return depending on how many things are associated with this user. Keep this in mind when programming.
**WARNING**: This will DELETE all things they are associated with. There is no going back! You **must** reassign all contacts before deleting a user, othwerise the delete will fail.

section.title: Permissions & Routes
section.docs: * `GET /users`: Anyon * `POST /users`: Admins only * `GET /users/:id`: Anyone * `PUT /users/:id`: Yourself, or anyone if you're an admin * `DELETE /users/:id`: Admins only

section.title: Format
section.docs:
id
ID for this record. Use this if you want to access it again.
created_at
Timestamp for when this record was added to the DB.
updated_at
Timestamp for when this record was last updated in the DB.
name
The full name
email
Email addressed used to log into Radium
phone
User's primary contact phone number
password
A nice strong password. All characters are accepted.
password_confirmation
Required if `password` has been changed.
api_key
Secret key used to grant access to the API. This attribute is only added when user matches the logged in user!
account
The ID for this user's company's account.
contacts
Associated contact IDs
deals
Associated deal IDs
campaigns
Associated campaign IDs
following
IDs for all the users this person is following
followers
IDs for all the users that are following this user
todos
Associated todo IDs
meetings
Associated meeting IDs
reminders
IDs for all reminders
notes
IDs for all this user's notes
phone_calls
IDs for all this user's phone calls
messages
IDs for all this user's messages (IM, SMS & Email)
activities
IDs for every activity in this user's feed
